title: Topics/Seminar in Programming Languages
description: Discussion on problems of current research interest in programming languages, formal methods, and software engineering. Possible areas of focus include program verification, program synthesis, language design and implementation, developer productivity tools, language-based security. Topics to be presented by faculty and students under faculty direction. Topics vary from quarter to quarter. May be taken for credit up to eighteen times for a maximum of eighteen units. Prerequisites: consent of instructor.
